text:
It would be nice to have all the documentation in the application.  Some of the controllers are not 
exactly intuative as to what they are and how to use them.  Searching the web site isn't always easy 
either.

Tool Tips & JavaHelp would be great!
creator: timothyreaves@westfieldgrp.com
mstover1@apache.org
text:
Absolutely.  Someone's gotta write it first, though :-).

I'd like to make this a 1.8 feature.

creator: mstover1@apache.org
text:
First pass at this is available.  Not all components are named correctly, and
not all are available in the help file.

Marking all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8's release date as VERIFIED.
Yes, it's pretty poor QA procedure, but there's bugs here lingering since JMeter
1.6, and we need to clean up a little.
creator: jsalvata@atg.com

text: Bulk-closing all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8 release date.
creator: jsalvata@atg.com
